title: Fixed asset process - Business rules
content:
The fixed asset workflow relies on a few simple business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase.

All processes

In the out-of-the-box device workflow, the rules detailed for each of the following events apply to all processes.

After change

Condition Service Management actions
If Net value isn't empty Currency = USD($)
If Depreciation scheme is Geometric and Depreciation rate isn't empty

Validate Depreciation rate >= 0 and <= 1

Display the fixed asset workflow error message in case of a failure
If Depreciation scheme is Sum of digits and Depreciation duration isn't null

Validate Depreciation duration > 0 and can be divided by 12

Display the fixed asset workflow error message in case of a failure

Rendering

Condition Service Management actions
If Depreciation scheme isn't Geometric Hide Depreciation rate
